full_transcript: We need to talk about rack density. As you pack more GPUs into your data center, your failure rate will climb. GridMaster uses automated phase balancing to prevent breaker trips. We've seen hardware failure rates drop from 2.4 percent down to 0.8 percent in managed clusters. It pays for itself in avoided downtime.
